parameters.query:
SELECT id, name, email, telegram_username
FROM reviewers
WHERE telegram_chat_id = $1::bigint

INSERT INTO conversation_state (chat_id, user_id, state_type, context_json, expires_at)
VALUES ($1, $2, $3, $4, NOW() + INTERVAL '1 hour')
ON CONFLICT (chat_id, user_id) DO UPDATE SET
  state_type = $3,
  context_json = $4,
  expires_at = NOW() + INTERVAL '1 hour'

parameters.text: ={{ $('Parse Callback Data').first().json.action === 'revision' ? 'Please provide the reason for requesting revision. Your next message will be recorded as the revision notes.' : 'Please provide the reason for rejection. Your next message will be recorded as the rejection reason.' }}

replyMarkup.input_field_placeholder: ={{ $('Parse Callback Data').first().json.action === 'revision' ? 'Enter revision notes...' : 'Enter rejection reason...' }}

parameters.query:
UPDATE reviews SET
  decision = $1,
  decision_at = NOW(),
  decision_reason = 'Approved'
WHERE bid_id = $2 AND review_type = $3
RETURNING id, bid_id

options.queryReplacement:
={{ [
  $json.id,
  $json.bid_id,
  $('Get Reviewer Info').first().json.id,
  $('Get Reviewer Info').first().json.name,
  $('Get Reviewer Info').first().json.telegram_username,
  $('Parse Callback Data').first().json.decision,
  $('Parse Callback Data').first().json.callback_id,
  $('Parse Callback Data').first().json.message_id
] }}

parameters.query:
INSERT INTO audit_log (
  entity_type, entity_id, action,
  actor_type, actor_id, actor_name, new_value, source
) VALUES (
  'review', $1, 'decision_made',
  'user', $2, $3, $4, 'telegram'
)

UPDATE bids SET
  status = 'APPROVED_TO_SUBMIT',
  updated_at = NOW()
WHERE id = $1

parameters.text:
={{ `🎉 BID APPROVED FOR SUBMISSION!

Bid ${$('Parse Callback Data').first().json.bid_id} has been approved and is ready for client submission.` }}

parameters.query:
SELECT state_type, context_json
FROM conversation_state
WHERE chat_id = $1 AND user_id = $2
AND expires_at > NOW()

UPDATE reviews SET
  decision = $1,
  decision_at = NOW(),
  decision_reason = $2,
  revision_count = CASE WHEN $1 = 'REVISION_REQUESTED' THEN revision_count + 1 ELSE revision_count END
WHERE bid_id = $3 AND review_type = $4
RETURNING id

DELETE FROM conversation_state
WHERE chat_id = $1 AND user_id = $2

parameters.text: ={{ `✅ Decision recorded. ${$('Process Reason').first().json.decision === 'REVISION_REQUESTED' ? 'The bid submitter will be notified of the required changes.' : 'The bid has been rejected.'}` }}
